title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label height does not change accordingly.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label height remains the same.

Expected behavior: Change label content so that its height adjusts to match the font size.
OB: The label height does not change when the font size is modified.
EB: After modifying the font size of the label, the label height should adjust accordingly.
SR:
1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label height does not change.
